channel.title: KAUotic Hacking Club
channel.description: Recent content on KAUotic Hacking Club

item.title: Presentations
item.description: This group in the club schedules lectures and presentations. Anyone is welcome to present something, even topics not directly linked to hacking and security. Notable presentations in the past include people from Telia and Google.

item.title: Ctf Dev
item.description: This is a group of people in the club creating Capture The Flag hacking challenges of all difficulties. They are maintaining and developing the CTFd platform at ctf.kauotic.se.

item.title: Ctf Team
item.description: This is a group of people in the club playing Capture The Flag hacking games.
